bibl.title: List: Hospital Corps personnel at Camp Lazear, Cuba, [1901?]

div1.p: This is a list of twelve U.S. Army Hospital Corps members who were stationed at Camp Lazear.

div1.head: List: Hospital Corps personnel at Camp Lazear, Cuba, [1901?]
div1.p:
Members of the Hospital Corps, U.S. Army, detailed to duty at
Camp Lazear, Cuba.

Newell R. Colby, Act'g Hosp. Stew'd, Nov. 20, 1900 to Jan'y 9, 1901.
John R. Kissinger, Priv., Hosp. Corps,
Act'g Hosp. Stewd, Dec. 20, 1900 " 20, " " Feb'y 9, 1901.
Henry de Lamar, Priv., Hosp. Corps, " 20, " " " 9, "
Levi E. Folk, " " 20, " " " 38, "
James L. Hanberry, " " 20, " " " 26, "
Warren G. Jernegan, " " 20, " " Jan'y 29, "
Adolph F. Springer, " " 20, " " Feb'y 9, "
Edward Weatherwalks, " " 20, " " " 11, "
James Hildebrand, " Dec. 20, " " " 9, "
William Olson, " " 20, " " " 9, "
Thomas M. England, " Jan'y 3, 1901 " " 9, "
Charles G. Sonntag, " " 13, " " " 26, "
[Compiled from Hospital Corps Returns, Columbia BKs, Cuba.]
